issue.title: [CI] Highlight number of failed builds in nighly report
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16252](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16252). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be nice if the nightly e-mail subject would include the number of failed builds.
So for example instead of:
```Java

[NIGHTLY] Arrow Build Report for Job nightly-tests-2022-04-19-0
```

have:
```Java

[NIGHTLY] Arrow Build Report for nightly-tests-2022-04-19-0: 3 failed, 0 pending
```
